title: Dankens Unicase
content:
Can anyone identify this quirky unicase? Many thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825022217im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dankens_6381.jpg)
author: Chris Keegan

comments.content: With some custom work you could get close with [Platelet](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825022217/http:/emigre.com/fontpage.php?PPlaH.html).
Thanks Michael. I could swear I've seen this somewhere before though. So, I was thinking this wasn't a custom job. Anyone else?
